title: Zone 1 Luminaires, Appliances, and Other Electrical Equipment
fullText: Luminaires, appliances, and other electrical equipment installed in Zone 1 shall be protected by one of the following measures: (a) SELV not exceeding 12 V a.c. r.m.s. or 30 V ripple-free d.c. with the safety source installed outside Zones 0 and 1; or (b) automatic disconnection of supply using an RCD with a rated residual operating current not exceeding 30 mA; or (c) electrical separation, the source of separation supplying only one item of equipment and being installed outside Zones 0 and 1.
